text.title: Make Your Birthday Wish Come True
text.head: Make Your Birthday Wish Come True
text.p: Don't you hate when you want to make a wish come true but don't know how to? Here are some really easy steps to get your wish granted, or TRY too. If you want that, then keep reading. Feel free to ask questions.
text.head: Steps
Start A Wish Journal

list.item:
Your counting down to your birthday! And your hoping the wish comes true. But so many wishes! What wish will you choose?
Start your Wish Journal. Draw pictures, write down your wishes, do anything you want explaining your wishes.

text.head: Get A Charm

list.item:
Some people say to get a charm bracelet, choker, or anything you can wear. Find a gold or silver chain and get a charm based on it. Want a phone? Get a phone charm.
If you want an animal, get the animal charm of it. Any charm based on what you want will work.
Where it till your wish starts coming true

text.head: Set Up A Calender

list.item:
"What day is it? How many more days left?" You probably ask yourself every morning. To keep organized, make a calender to help count down the days.
Every day, cross off a number. Keep organized in the calender and journal. This is especially important for the big day.

text.head: Calming Down & Sleeping Well

list.item:
Every night, don't stay up and watch TV! Goto sleep, and put on some classical music and light some candles {If you're a child, ask your parents to this or buy some lavender}.
Remember to wish every night. Do not change the wish. Every night you wish, the more powerful the chance of the wish coming true is.

text.head: The Big Day

list.item:
Finally! Your birthday's today! And your ready for this wish. Did you do all the steps?
Don't tell ANYONE your wish. or it will not come true. But before you do, have complete faith in this.

text.head: Blowing Out The Candles

list.item:
This is the big moment. The Birthday Song's playing, everyone's grinning at you, ready for you to blow the candles out.
close your eyes, puff up your cheeks with air, and POOF! As you blow out the candles, silently think your wish.

text.head: Getting Back-Up {Optional}

list.item:
There's an old tale about writing down your wish after you blow out the candles and getting a flower seed and putting it in a flower pot.Put your paper inside the pot too.
As the flower sprouts, your wish is coming more and more true.

text.head: Tips

list.item: Have your candles close together. That way you've more chance to blow them all out at once.
Think about the wish as you blow the candles.
Close your eyes and make sure you have a big, poof of air in your mouth to blow out those candles.
Meditating will have a lot, thinking about your wish.

text.head: Warnings

list.item: DO NOT make the wish harmful, or most likely the nature spirits will never grant your wishes ever, ever again.
Do not open your eyes during the process of blowing the candles.
If after you blow out the candles you light them again, the second time wish will NOT be granted.
